ComicInfo.Title: Horror on Haunted Hill!; Forever Is a Long Time!; A Shriek in the Night; The Man Who Walked on Water!; The Man Who Steals Gravestones!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Horror on Haunted Hill!: An alien from Saturn lands in a graveyard.
Forever Is a Long Time!: A man finds a bottle containing a genie who is content to stay in the bottle.
A Shriek in the Night: A man saves a women who is being chased by a man, only to find that the situation isn't what he thought it was.
The Man Who Walked on Water!: A man out on a boat sees another man walking along the surface of the water. He demands the secret of waterwalking from the reluctant man at gunpoint and the other man relents under duress. They dive beneath the waves, the man rubs coral on his feet, and the ritual is completed. He heads to the beach, thinking that he's going to make a mint, and promptly sinks into the sand.
The Man Who Steals Gravestones!: A man who steals gravestones in order to grind them down and resell them is thwarted when one of the corpses wants it back.
